description.en:
Want to have a change from snow and miserable weather ruining your harvests? Travel to Paraguay and get a feel for farming in South America. This mod provides localized weather, growth and economy to your Seasons gameplay. Animal feed and production are also changed to reflect the conditions.
This mod requires at least version 1.2 of Seasons. It was made specifically for the Platinum DLC, but can be used on any map.
